actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide that Representatives in Congress be apportioned on the basis of the number of United States citizens in each State.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Proposes an amendment to the Constitution to provide that Representatives in Congress be apportioned on the basis of the number of U.S. citizens in each State.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide that Representatives in Congress be apportioned on the basis of the number of United States citizens in each State.
